name: IMPROV ALL-STARS
short_description: Are you ready to step into the world of improv and let your creativity run wild? With no script or pre-planned plot, every moment becomes an opportunity to showcase your quick wit and unbridled imagination
description: From the first line to the final act, each scene in improv is a spontaneous creation, crafted in real-time by the performers on stage. You never know what direction the story will take, or what twists and turns await around the corner. So let's throw caution to the wind and embrace the thrill of the unknown. Together, we'll weave tales of adventure, wholesomeness, and everything in between, all while honing our on-spot performing skills and building a deeper connection with our fellow actors. With improv, the only limit is our own creativity. So what are you waiting for? Ready, set, improv! Let's see where our imaginations take us.
rules:
1)General Rules                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The team should consist of minimum 2 to maximum 3 members.                                                                                                                                                                                                             Every act must be within a maximum of 3 minutes.
Participants must speak only in TAMIL.                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
The selection criteria is purely based on the First come and First Serve Basis
Certificate of merit and participation will be provided                                                                                                                                                                          
Decorum must be maintained and unparliamentary language is not entertained. Failure to adhere to this will lead to immediate disqualification 
Judge’s decision is final and absolute.
2) Prelims - Questions 
Two teams will be up against each other 
Each team will send out one member to face off 
The setting of the skit will be taken from the crowd/ other participants/ MC 
Both members will act out according to the theme by asking questions 
All dialogues in the skit should only consist of questions 
The member who fails to ask a question first is eliminated and the next member from their team takes their place and the skit continuous, same applies if they take too long to respond or if the question asked is not in theme with the skit 
The team to lose all three members lose the round and the other team qualifies 
3) Finals - Crosstalk 
Teams will perform individual skits 
The setting of the skit will be taken from the crowd/ other participants/ MC 
Two members act out the skit, however only one of these two members gets to use their voice, and the other person is not allowed to speak 
The third member will give an active voice over for the member who is not allowed to speak(dubbing) and the corresponding members shall act out the entire skit 
The team that performs the longest without breaking the rules win

name: Movie in a parallel universe
short_description: This event allows participants to think of a situation in a different dimension. They have to tell the alternate perspective of the story given to them as what if the story happens in a parallel universe
description: Parallel cinema is the term given to certain kinds of films made in India that are different from conventional and mainstream cinema. Parallel cinema cannot be considered a film movement as a whole, although it consists of various smaller movements in itself. The film and filmmakers associated with this often have very little in common with each other ideologically or stylistically. Parallel cinema is known for its serious content and symbolic elements with a keen eye on the sociopolitical climax.

description:
Join us for a magical night of trivia as we put your knowledge of the wizarding world to the test with our Harry Potter Quiz! Gather your fellow Hogwarts housemates and prepare for a night of challenging questions covering all aspects of the beloved series, from spells and potions to Quidditch and magical creatures. 
Our quiz master will guide you through a series of rounds, each one more challenging than the last, as you compete for the title of Hogwarts Champion. So, dust off your robes, grab your wand, and get ready to prove your magical mettle in this exciting and fun-filled Harry Potter Quiz. May the best wizard or witch win!
rules:
ROUND 1: FIENDFYRE (Rapid fire round)
In this round, each team will be asked ten questions in succession.
 When a question is asked immediately, each team has 5 seconds to respond.
If a team is unable to answer a question, it might be passed on to the following question.
 This round does not include any team discussions.
 The correct answer is worth 10 points. There are no deductions for incorrect answers.
 After a query is passed, the team cannot respond later.
This round does not have a buzzer.
ROUND 2: RENNEVERATE (Buzzer round)
 10 questions will be thrown at each team one after the other.
 Teams can confer among themselves before pressing the buzzer/bell to answer the question first. After pressing the buzzer, no further debate is permitted.
 The team that presses the buzzer/bell first has the opportunity to respond.
 10 points for correct answers and -5 points for incorrect answers.
 If a team does not respond or responds incorrectly after the buzzer, they lose 5 points. If a team presses the buzzer before the question is finished, they will be asked to answer it before the question is finished.
 The question must be answered in 20 seconds or less.
If the first team to press the bell does not answer a question. The team that pressed the bell first has the opportunity to respond.
 In this round, there are no options. If two teams press the buzzer/bell at the same time, a card will be drawn to determine who gets to answer if.
 If the first team successfully responds, they receive a point.
 If they answer incorrectly, they lose 5 points and the next team to press the buzzer gets to answer.
ROUND 3 /(INCASE OF TIE): SONOROUS (audio-based round)
       The teams will be made to listen to an incomplete audio clip of a few famous quotes from the series.
       The team must complete the phrase and guess who said it.
       Questions will not be passed to the next team.
       No negative points for wrong answers.
The registration is based on First Come First Serve.
Certificate of merit and participation will be awarded.

name: DEFECTIVE DETECTIVE
short_description:
In this immersive activity, participants will step into the shoes of a detective as they investigate a crime scene. The scene could be a homicide, infanticide, serial killing, suicide, manslaughter, or any other scenario based on the modus operandi. 
Get ready to channel your inner Sherlock holmes!
description:
A Crime scene will be erected and the participants must take the mantle of a detective and
start finding clues around the scene….and deduce the killer and the sequence of events that
might have occurred. It could be Homicide, Infanticide, Serial Killing(Based on the Modus
operandi), Suicide, Manslaughter, etc.
rules:
No tampering with the crime scene: Participants should not move or touch any objects
unless directed to do so by the event organizers.
Follow the clues: Participants must focus on finding and examining the clues present
at the scene. No outside resources or information may be used.
Stay in character: Participants must remain in character as detectives throughout the
event, following the investigative protocols and questioning witnesses as needed.
Respect the privacy of others: Participants must not interfere with or disturb any other
players or members of the public not involved in the event.
Stay safe: Participants must be aware of their surroundings at all times and take
precautions to avoid accidents or injuries while investigating the crime scene.
No photography or recording: Participants are not allowed to take photographs or
record any part of the event to maintain the integrity and privacy of the crime scene.
Confidentiality: Participants must not share any information about the crime scene,
the investigation, or any other details of the event with anyone outside of the event.
Adhere to time limits: Participants must solve the crime within the time limits set by
the event organizers.
Use provided equipment: Participants must use the equipment provided by the event
organizers, such as flashlights, magnifying glasses, etc., and not bring any additional
equipment.
Follow event guidelines: Participants must follow all guidelines and instructions
provided by the event organizers and cooperate with other participants to solve the
crime scene challenge.
The registration will be a First Come First Serve process.
Certificate of merit and participation will be awarded

name: SCRIBBLE SCRAMBLE
short_description: Are you up for the challenge of taking on two of the hottest topics? Scribble Scramble presents 'College Dreams vs. Reality' and 'Media's Beauty Trap' - pick your poison and let the words fly!
description:
Do you remember your first day of college? The excitement, the anticipation, and the dreams of what your college life would be like? But what happens when those expectations clash with the reality of college life? Share your experiences and insights on how your college expectations differed from reality, and the lessons you learned along the way. 
Alternatively, have you ever wondered how media shapes our perceptions of beauty and body image? From magazines to social media, we are constantly bombarded with images of what the media defines as beautiful. But how do these unrealistic standards affect our self-esteem and body image? Do they influence the choices we make about our appearance? Share your unique perspective on this topic and delve into the impact of the media on our perceptions of beauty and body image. 
Remember, we're looking for essays that provide original insights and perspectives. So, get creative, share your unique experiences and thoughts, and show us your writing skills! You have one hour to craft an essay that will capture our attention and leave a lasting impression. Good luck!
rules:
The competition is open to all college students both UG and PG
Essays must be between 800 and 1,000 words; Essays must be written on the given A4-sized paper with topics in bold.
All essays submitted must be original work and must not have been previously published.
Plagiarism, which includes any form of copying or unauthorised use of another person's work, is strictly prohibited. Any evidence of plagiarism will result in immediate disqualification.
All entries must be submitted at the college campus at the stipulated time. Late submissions will not be accepted.
Judge’s decision is final and absolute.
The registration will be a First Come First Serve process.
Participation and winner certificates will be provided.

description: பட்டிமன்றம் என்ற நிகழ்வில் 6 நபர்கள் பங்கேற்பார்கள். போட்டி தொடங்கும் 15 நிமிடங்கள் முன்னரே தலைப்பு வழங்கப்படும். 3 நபர்கள் கொண்ட ஒரு அணி தலைப்பை சார்ந்தும் மற்றோர் அணி தலைப்பை எதிர்த்தும் வாதாடுவார்கள். இரு தரப்பு வாதத்தை கேட்டு நடுவர் தீர்ப்பை அறிவிப்பார். சிறந்த போட்டியாளர்களுக்கு பரிசுகள் வழங்கப்படும்.
rules:
தகுதி சற்றின் விதிமுறைகள்:
கல்லூரி மாணவர்கள் அனைவரும் போட்டியில் கலந்து கொள்ளலாம்.
மாணவர்கள் தனித்தனியாக பங்கேற்க வேண்டும்.
போட்டி தொடங்கும் 15 நிமிடங்களுக்கு முன்னரே தலைப்புகள் வழங்கப்படும்.
போட்டியாளர்களுக்கு ஐயங்கள் இருப்பின் நிர்வாகிகள் உதவுவார்கள்.
மாணவர்கள் தங்களுடைய குறிப்புகளைப் பார்த்து பேசக்கூடாது.
போட்டியாளர்கள் அதிகபட்சமாக 1 நிமிடம் பேசலாம்.
நடுவர்கள் தீர்ப்பே இறுதியானது.
தகுதி சுற்றில் வெற்றி பெறும் போட்டியாளர்கள் இறுதி சுற்றில் இரு அணிகளாகப் பிரிக்கப்பட்டு பட்டிமன்றம் நடைபெறும்.
இறுதி சுற்றின் விதிமுறைகள்:
தகுதி சுற்றில் வெற்றி பெற்றவர்கள்
இறுதி சுற்றில் பங்கு பெறுவார்கள். ஒரு அணியில் 3 நபர்கள் இருப்பார்கள். 
போட்டி தொடங்கும் 15 நிமிடங்களுக்கு முன்னரே தலைப்பு வழங்கப்படும்.
போட்டியாளர்கள் அதிகபட்சம் 5 நிமிடங்கள் பேசலாம்.
போட்டியாளர்களுக்கு ஐயங்கள் இருப்பின் நிர்வாகிகள் உதவுவார்கள்.
மாணவர்கள் தங்களுடைய குறிப்புகளை வைத்து பேசலாம்.
வெற்றியாளர்களை நடுவரே தேர்ந்தெடுப்பார்.
போட்டியாளர்கள் ஒழுக்கமற்ற முறையில் பேசக்கூடாது.

short_description: Football is played with the head. Your feet are just the tools “. Get ready to kick it up a notch with our futsal event.
description: BlueLock will be a 5 a side futsal tournament. Futsal is a football-based sport played on a hard court smaller than a football pitch. With thrilling opponents and challenging matches this event is the ultimate test of your football talent and strategies. Unleash the egoist within you in our blue lock.
rules:
This will be a team event.
This event is open only to men.
Participants are expected to form a group of  5 to 8 players.
The basic rules of football will be followed along with few additional rules such as:
Rolling Substitutions - There’s no limit for substitutions and any player can be replaced at anytime 
Accumulated Fouls - A direct freekick without a wall will be awarded if the opposition commits six freekick fouls within a single half 
Double Penalty - A penalty will be awarded at the second penalty spot(which is closer to the goalpost) if a player commits the teams 7th foul inside the penalty box
4 second count - The goalkeeper is limited to hold the ball with his hands for only 4 seconds inside the penalty box. 
Players must come with their proper kit.
The Official’s decision will be final.
The registration will be a First Come First Serve process.
Certificate of merit and participation will be awarded.
